content: Gentle reminder about invoice INV-001. We understand you're busy and appreciate your business.
Spoke with CFO about delayed payment. Cited cash flow issues but committed to pay within 2 weeks.
Second reminder about overdue invoice. Please prioritize this payment.
This is our final reminder before escalating to collections.
Friendly reminder about your recent invoice. Happy to discuss payment terms if needed.
Payment overdue. Please remit immediately to avoid service disruption.
Final notice before legal action. Payment required within 7 days.
Following up on invoice payment. Please confirm receipt and expected payment date.
